Uses of Package
edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse

  • Packages that use edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse 
    Package Description
    edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse  
    edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.test  
  • Classes in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse used by edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse 
    Class and Description
    Dice
    This class solely deals with creating random numbers in the game.
    Enemy
    This class has parameters that will define the position of the enemy pirate as well as whether they are alive.
    ExtraAmmo
    This class will assign GameObject to the Extra Bullet class and make it possible for the Player to get an extra bullet when the pick it up.
    File_Handler
    This class deals with all interactions between the game and saving/loading functions.
    GameObject
    This method is the super class for all game objects: Player, Enemy, Shield, Room, Radar, and ExtraAmmo.
    Grid
    This class deals with all GameObjects on the 9x9 grid that the game takes place on.
    Player
    This Player class will contain parameters that will define the player's status, upgrade status, position, and number of lives.
    Radar
    This class gives the Radar the ability to show where the Room containing the briefcase is located on the Grid.
    Room
    This class represents intances of room objects.
    Shield
    This class represents the shield object, it will protect the Player from being stabbed by an Enemy for a set number of turns.
    Sound
    This class runs the audio for the game.
    UserInterface
    This class basically serves to print all information to the command prompt.
  • Classes in edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse used by edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.test 
    Class and Description
    GameObject
    This method is the super class for all game objects: Player, Enemy, Shield, Room, Radar, and ExtraAmmo.
